title: CALIFORNIA FLAG
content:
Hey friends,

I was wondering, can anyone identify the typeface used in the California Flag? Is this even a font that can be bought as an electronic file? Gracias for your time.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [55905327\_327b78603a\_b.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313163302/http:/typophile.com/files/55905327_327b78603a_b.jpg) | 173.31 KB |
author: elderzninja

comments.content: These letters were probably drawn specifically for the flag. You can get close with [Refrigerator](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313163302/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/refrigerator/?sample_text=CALIFORNIA%20REPUBLIC&sample_size=36), but you'll need to do that 'R' by hand.
